welcome_text: If you're having trouble staying awake until your recommended bedtime, see the Activities to Keep You Awake, below, for ideas on how to keep yourself up until itâ€™s time for bed.
If an activity continues to work for you tap the star next to it to highlight it.

stars.text: Work on a project or hobby that you find interesting
Read a book that is hard to put down
Listen to upbeat music (sing or hum along)
Go outside (if in a safe area)
Prepare meals for the rest of the week
